TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BooleanSwitch extends System.Diagnostics.Switch

summary.span: 提供簡單的開啟/關閉參數，可控制偵錯和追蹤輸出。

span.span: Provides a simple on/off switch that controls debugging and tracing output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用布林追蹤參數，以啟用或停用根據其重要性排序訊息。You can use a Boolean trace switch to enable or disable messages based on their importance. 使用屬性來取得參數的目前值。Use the property to get the current value of the switch. 您可以啟用或停用透過應用程式組態檔，然後使用已設定的應用程式中的值。You can enable or disable a through the application configuration file and then use the configured value in your application. 或者，您可以建立的程式碼，以及組直接來檢測程式碼的特定區段的屬性。Alternately, you can create a in your code and set the property directly to instrument a specific section of code. 若要設定，編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To configure a , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在這個檔案中，您可以新增或移除參數、 設定參數的值，或清除所有應用程式先前設定的參數。Within this file, you can add or remove a switch, set a switch's value, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 組態檔應該格式如下列範例所示。The configuration file should be formatted like the following example. ``` ``` 這個範例的組態區段會定義與屬性設定為`mySwitch`和值設定為`true`。This example configuration section defines a with the property set to `mySwitch` and the value set to `true`. 在應用程式時，您可以使用設定的參數值，藉由建立具有相同名稱，如下列程式碼範例所示。Within your application, you can use the configured switch value by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following code example. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 根據預設，屬性會設定使用組態檔中指定的值。By default, the property is set using the value specified in the configuration file. 設定參數值為 0 時可設定屬性`false`; 設定為非零值以設定參數屬性`true`。Configure the switch with a value of 0 to set the property to `false`; configure the switch with a nonzero value to set the property to `true`. 如果建構函式組態檔中找不到初始參數設定屬性的新參數設定為`false`預設。If the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the property of the new switch is set to `false` by default. 您必須啟用追蹤或偵錯，以使用參數。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a switch. 下列語法是特定的編譯器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果您使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 以外的編譯器，請參閱編譯器的文件。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要啟用偵錯 C# 中，加入`/d:DEBUG`旗標設為編譯器命令列，當您編譯程式碼，或者您可以加入`#define DEBUG`加入您的檔案頂端。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，加入`/d:DEBUG=True`編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要啟用追蹤，在 C# 中的，加入`/d:TRACE`旗標設為編譯器命令列，當您編譯程式碼，或新增`#define TRACE`加入您的檔案頂端。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，加入`/d:TRACE=True`編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. > [!NOTE] > 這些偵錯和追蹤編譯器參數使用時則不需要隔離的類別。These debug and trace compiler switches are not required when using the class in isolation. 它們只需要搭配或有條件地編譯的方法。They are only required in conjunction with or methods that are conditionally compiled. 如需有關如何檢測您的應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱和。For more information on instrumenting your application, see and . 如需有關設定和使用追蹤參數的詳細資訊，請參閱[追蹤參數](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)。For more information about configuring and using trace switches, see [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md). > [!NOTE] > 若要改善效能，您可以進行成員`static`在您的類別。To improve performance, you can make members `static` in your class. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並使用參數來判斷是否要列印錯誤訊息。The following example creates a and uses the switch to determine whether to print an error message. 您在類別層級建立交換器。You create the switch at the class level. `Main`方法會傳遞至其位置`MyMethod`、 印出錯誤訊息和發生錯誤。The `Main` method passes its location to `MyMethod`, which prints an error message and where the error occurred. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string displayName, string description) cil managed
Public Sub New (displayName As String, description As String)

param.name: displayName
param.span: 要顯示在使用者介面上的名稱。

span.span: The name to display on a user interface.

summary.span: 使用指定的顯示名稱和描述，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name and description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立、`displayName`參數用來尋找初始參數設定。When you create a , the `displayName` parameter is used to find initial switch settings. 如果建構函式找不到初始設定，屬性設定為`false`（停用）。If the constructor cannot find initial settings, the property is set to `false` (disabled). 若要設定的層級您，編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To set the level of your , edit the configuration file corresponding to the name of your application. 在這個檔案中，可以加入某個參數，並將其值設定、 移除參數，或清除所有先前設定的應用程式的參數。Within this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all switches previously set by the application. 組態檔應該格式如下列範例所示：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 您所建立的參數應該是`static`。The switches you created should be `static`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，並使用參數來判斷是否要列印錯誤訊息。The following example creates a and uses the switch to determine whether to print an error message. 在類別層級被建立交換器。The switch is created at the class level. `Main`方法會傳遞至其位置`MyMethod`、 印出錯誤訊息和發生錯誤。The `Main` method passes its location to `MyMethod`, which prints an error message and where the error occurred. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.BooleanSwitch Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public BooleanSwitch (string displayName, string description, string defaultSwitchValue);

Public Sub New (displayName As String, description As String, defaultSwitchValue As String)
public: BooleanSwitch(System::String ^ displayName, System::String ^ description, System::String ^ defaultSwitchValue);

param.name: displayName
param.span: 要在使用者介面上顯示的名稱。

span.span: The name to display on the user interface.
The default value of the switch.

summary.span: 以指定的顯示名稱、描述和預設參數值初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified display name, description, and default switch value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`參數用來設定的值屬性，而`description`參數用來設定的值屬性。The `displayName` parameter is used to set the value of the property, and the `description` parameter is use to set the value of the property. `defaultSwitchValue`參數是儲存為欄位，用來初始化上第一個參考的屬性。The `defaultSwitchValue` parameter is saved as a field and used to initialize the property on first reference. 如需使用建構函式的詳細資訊，請參閱建構函式。For more information about constructor use, see the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出此參數是否已啟用或停用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the switch is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果已啟用此參數，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the switch is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個欄位設定為`false`（停用）。By default, this field is set to `false` (disabled). 若要啟用此參數，此欄位的值指派`true`。To enable the switch, assign this field the value of `true`. 若要停用此參數，將值指定給`false`。To disable the switch, assign the value to `false`. 這個屬性的值取決於基底類別屬性的值。The value of this property is determined by the value of the base class property . > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會使用以防止從信任的程式碼呼叫的旗標; 立即呼叫端必須要有權限。This method uses the flag to prevent being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果您的程式碼可以呼叫從部分信任程式碼，不要傳遞的使用者輸入類別而不需驗證方法。If your code can be called from partially trusted code, do not pass the user input to class methods without validation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，並使用參數來判斷是否要列印錯誤訊息。The following code example creates a and uses the switch to determine whether to print an error message. 在類別層級被建立交換器。The switch is created at the class level. `Main`方法會傳遞至其位置`MyMethod`，其會列印錯誤訊息，並且在發生錯誤的位置。The `Main` method passes its location to `MyMethod`, which prints an error message and the location where the error occurred. [!code-cpp[Classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic BooleanSwitch.Enabled Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有正確的權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the correct permission.

permission.span: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。
要求值;列舉型別相關聯： 。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnValueChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 判斷 屬性的新值是否可以剖析為布林值。

span.span: Determines whether the new value of the property can be parsed as a Boolean value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會決定新值的布林值 （"false"或"true"） 的有效字串表示。The method determines whether the new value is a valid string representation of a Boolean value ("false" or "true"). 如果該方法的設定，屬性為 0 或 1。If so, the method sets the property to 0 or 1. 否則，呼叫基底方法，可將字串值轉換成整數值，然後用來設定屬性。Otherwise, the base method is called, which converts the string value to an integer value, which is then used to set the property.
